title: Import Obj with `FileObjReadOptions` with no `.ToDictionary`
question:
Hi, it’s me again 


I’m looking for some documentation for how to use the 
FileObjReadOptions
 class from 
Rhino.FileIO
 import a obj file into a headless doc (from C#).


For pretty much all other file types (skp, ply, stl, dst, pdf) there exists a 
.ToDictionary
 function on the 
FileXXXReadOptions
 class. And this can be simply passed to the 
RhinoDoc.Import(string, ArchivableDictionary)
 function.

Except for 
FileObjReadOptions
, where there is no 
.ToDictionary
 
…


So I’m a bit confused how to use that class, and I can’t any code samples where people are using it. Nor can I find any related source code in the mcneel/rhino3dm repo…


Ultimately my goal is to simply import obj files into a headless doc using this 
FileObjReadOptions
 to adjust the Y → Z up and Obj groups settings…

code_blocks.author: farouk.serragedine
